article_title: New Taxes Under The Affordable Care Act

article_metadata.description: By Brian O'Connell The Affordable Care Act (ACA) has changed the healthcare insurance landscape. Some of the most important changes stemming from Obamacare center around taxes. Under the ACA, the total amount of new taxes on individuals and businesses will climb to $500 billion by 2023. Altogether, there are 21 new taxes [...]
